title: Runes and Masterys
body:
So just a serious question, in Champ select atm and i swear the rune page and the mastery page are bouncing to the left slightly every few seconds.

Please someone tell me i'm not crazy.

replies.body:
You're crazy.

On a more serious note, I haven't noticed it.
I'm staring at it trying to look in a way it won't do it and it keeps happening, someone get me a straight jacket.
